dict.string: 1. Password protection and answers
Strongly recommended that you first set up password protection, because password protection is only basis for you retrieve login password and folder password when forgot;
2. Login password
3. Folder password
1) You can set password for each folder; 2) Access control can set secret folder hidden or display;
1. Photo and video description
Photos and videos operation are similar so we explain photos operation as example;
2. Folder
1) Click + on the left-top, you can create new folders; 2) Delete folder:Click edit button on the right-top to delete folder;
3. Upload photos and videos to system album
Click one photo folder to enter, then click first button on the bottom, select photos upload to system album;
4. Download photos and videos from system album to program
Click one photo folder to enter, then click second button on the bottom, download photos and videos from system album to program(To access the system album needs your permission);
5. Take a photo or video
Click one photo folder to enter, then click third button on the bottom, you can take a photo or video;
6. Modify folder name
Click one photo folder to enter, then click fourlh button on the bottom, you can modify the folder name;
7. Delete photos and videos
Click one photo folder to enter, then click fifth button on the bottom, you can delete file;
8. Full screen view photos or play videos
In the photo or vide0 9 palace grid list screen, click on a photo or video, you can view photos or play videos in full screen;
9. Set folder password
Click set-password button on the right-top, then set password for this folder;
10. Move files
Enter one folder,click the upload button on the bottom,you can move photos or videos to exist folder or new folder;
11. Can't take a photograph
Please go to "Setting"->"Privacy"->"Camera' set allow program access camera.
1. More features are in development, please wait
If you have any comments and suggestions, please click "Settings" -> "Suggestion Feedback", send us an e-mail. Look forward to your support, we are always working hard...
